Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Class A office building with recently upgraded amenities including fitness center, deli, and common areas.  Covered parking available.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Great Oak Brook Location, Across from Oak Brook Center Mall.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
7,668 SF Sublease
Term through February 28, 2025
Furniture included
Turnkey space
Five (5) executive parking spaces
Amenities include fitness center, conferencing facility, food service, convenience store and dry cleaner
Next door to Oak Brook Center Mall

Oak Brook Twenty Two consists of approximately 400,000 square feet of
premier office and vibrant ground floor retail space with two identical 11-story
office towers, a single-story “link” connecting the towers, and a separate
four-story freestanding office building.
This office complex is strategically located on 22nd Street, with direct access to
I-88. Oak Brook Twenty Two also provides tenants with the following building
features and amenities: fitness center, conference center, tenant wi-fi loung, Michael Jordan's restaurant, deli, farmers fridge, FedEx, 24/7 security, covered parking, outdoor patio, and on-site property management.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Updated common area lobbies and corridors

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located in the Oak Brook Shopping Center next to the Renaissance Hotel.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: New common area wifi lounge and conference center, updated common area lobbies and corridors, covered parking
